title: Dev UI Hot reload
body:
### Describe the bug

Seems like the hot reload for Dev UI is not efficient, and runs every time. DevConsoleProcessor.collectTemplates and the WebJarProcessor.processWebJarDevMode should only run when needed. 

### Expected behavior

DevConsoleProcessor.collectTemplates and the WebJarProcessor.processWebJarDevMode should only run when needed

### Actual behavior

DevConsoleProcessor.collectTemplates and the WebJarProcessor.processWebJarDevMode runs on every host reload
